jobDescription: Job Title: Software Engineer II  Work Location: Sacramento, CA 95816 Job Description:Work in a collaborative, open, laid back environmentBe responsible for data mining and machine learning exercises to facilitate the normalization and indexing of legal content (Legislation, Statutes, Caselaw, etc).Come to recognize opportunities for process & code improvement as you learn the ropesRequired Skills3-5 years software development experienceBackground in data mining, data science, machine learning (particularly text classification), Natural Language Processing (NLP)Strong verbal, written and some visual (e.g. diagramming, flowcharting) communication skillsExperience developing in and scripting your development processes in LinuxExperience with multiple scripting languages, preferably PythonA firm grasp on using Regular Expressions or XPATH to accomplish data mining exercises; preferably exposure to bothA solid understanding of object oriented programming (OOP) principlesIntermediate-to-advanced understanding of SQL and relational databases Desirable Skills Object Oriented Design Patterns (Dependency Injection, Factory, Abstract Factory, etc)AWS exposureAgile/Scrum/Kanban exposureExposure to XML parsing (SAX, DOM, XSLT, etc.) and generation/serializationSkills:Background in data mining, data science, machine learningExperience with multiple scripting languages, preferably PythonIntermediate-to-advanced understanding of SQL and relational databases
